instructions.title: Explore the Fruit Showroom
instructions.description: Begin your journey through Vietnam‚Äôs fruit world with this easy step-by-step guide.

step1.title: Discover the Fruit Gallery
step1.description: Browse our diverse collection of 34 iconic fruits from across Vietnam. Use filters to explore by region or search for your favorite fruit.

step2.title: Learn About Each Fruit
step2.description: Click on a fruit card to open a detailed modal, uncovering the story, origin, and cultural value of each fruit through vivid images and descriptions.

step3.title: Join Our Community
step3.description: Subscribe to our newsletter for exclusive fruit stories, event updates, and invitations to virtual orchard tours. Share your journey on social media!
